title: League Client
body: Me and my friends constantly have problems with the client and you Riot tries their best to avoid these problems. My friend's rune pages reset, my client froze during champion select and I couldn't select anything, and also 80% of the time I can't select the runes page.

replies.body:
Yikes, it sounds like you're all getting hit with a lot of problems.

We're still getting a lot of similar reports from players experiencing like issues, and we're on the hunt for some wide scale solutions. For now, be sure that both you and your friend try Low Spec mode to help lighten the load for the client, and also troubleshoot your [**permissions settings using these steps**](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ) to assure they're not blocking anything!

Also, we strongly encourage sending for help from [**Tech Support in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if it's still affecting you. The more data they retrieve the better equipped they are to find a solution, and they can also offer more in depth support in private!
